channel.title: Tales from the Cult Campaign
channel.description: An epic D&D campaign following heroes as they uncover ancient mysteries and battle dark forces.

item.title: Cult: Chapter 01 - Temple (Part 1)
item.description: "The jungle holds its breath, and in that silence, madness blooms."

item.title: Cult: Chapter 01 - Temple (Part 2)
item.description: "Where the laws of nature bow to elder dreams..."

item.title: Cult: Chapter 01 - Temple (Part 3)
item.description: "In these halls, identity melts like wax, and the walls remember every face they've worn..."

item.title: Cult: Chapter 01 - Temple (Part 4)
item.description: *"In the shadow of dead stars, even gods can dream..."*

item.title: Cult: Chapter 01 - Temple (Part 5)
item.description: *"The water remembers what we wish to forget..."*

item.title: Cult: Chapter 01 - Temple (Part 6)
item.description: *"In this place, knowledge hungers..."*

item.title: Cult: Chapter 01 - Temple (Part 7)
item.description: *"Where flesh dreams of becoming..."*

item.title: Cult: Chapter 01 - Temple (Part 8)
item.description: *Eighth episode in the Temple of Infinite Madness series*

item.title: Cult: Chapter 01 - Temple (Part 9)
item.description: *"Where yesterday meets tomorrow, and both scream..."*

item.title: Cult: Chapter 01 - Temple (Part 10)
item.description: *"Where reality ends, truth begins..."*

item.title: Cult: Chapter 01 - Temple (Part 11)
item.description: *"In nothing, we find everything..."*

item.title: Cult: Chapter 01 - Temple (Part 12)
item.description: *"The sweetest prison is the one we choose..."*

item.title: Cult: Chapter 01 - Temple (Part 13)
item.description: *Series Finale of the Temple of Infinite Madness*
